name: io.github.gitmem-dev/gitmem
description: Persistent institutional memory for AI coding agents. Memory that compounds.

environmentVariables.description: Supabase project URL for pro tier features (semantic search, analytics). Not required for free tier.
environmentVariables.name: SUPABASE_URL

environmentVariables.description: Supabase service role key for pro tier features. Not required for free tier.
environmentVariables.name: SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY
